short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's your go-to buddy for notes and todos. Say goodbye to chaos and hello to organized awesomeness with just one click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Why to install different extensions or using pen-paper in the the world of monitors. Install our noskii extension and store all your important notes/links/todos in one place and never ever lose in your life.
